property.name: Text
property.value: [Stark] Lord character only. Attached character gets +2 STR and gains renown. If attached character is Robb Stark, he does not kneel to attack or defend.

property.value: Attached character must defend, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to your house card. Discard all other attachments on this House card when played. Response: kneel attached House card to save one of your locations from being discarded from play.

property.value: Treat attached character's text box as though it were blank. Attached character may not attack or defend. Discard Ward from play at any time you do not control a Lord or Lady character.

property.value: Response: after a [Stark] character is killed, Catelyn claims 1 power (limit once per phase).

property.name: Text
property.value: While Eddard Stark is defending, lower the Claim value on the attacking player's plot card by 1.

property.name: Text

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: kneel one of your Stronghold locations to save Sansa Stark from being killed or discarded.

property.name: Text

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you play a character, search your deck for a copy of that character, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards. (Limit once per phase).

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after defenders are declared, kneel and discard Bell Tower (cannot be saved) to remove all characters from the current [Power] challenge.

property.name: Text

property.value: Response: after defenders are declared, kneel and discard Hunter's Gate (cannot be saved) to remove all characters from the current [Intrigue] challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: pay 1 gold to put the top card of a player's discard pile on the bottom of his or her deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: kneel to choose a character. That character gains a Military icon until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you win a [Military] challenge by 4 or more total STR, draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel to lower the cost of the next [Stark] card you play this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: [Lannister] Lady only. Limit 1 per character. Attached character gets +2 STR during [Intrigue] challenges. If attached character is Cersei Lannister, she gains 'Response: return Cersei Lannister and all her attachments to owner's hand to cancel the effects of an event card just played.'

property.name: Text
property.value: Kneel atttached character when played. Attached character does not stand during the standing phase. Discard this card from play if attached character's owner wins an Intrigue challenge against you.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: play during a [Power] challenge. Kneel one of your characters with STR 3 or higher to lower the printed Claim value on the attacking player's plot card to 0 for the duration of the challenge. No responses to this challenge may be used.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Targaryen only. Marshalling: pay X gold to choose a character without attachments. Until the end of the phase, that character's STR is -X and is killed it its STR is 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Greyjoy only. Marshalling: pay X gold to discard the top X cards from each opponent's deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: pay 1 gold to search your deck for a Dragon card, reveal it to all players, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Targaryen only. Marshalling: pay 3 gold to choose a character. Discard any number of non-duplicate attachments on that character. Then draw a card for each attachment discarded in this way.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: cancel the effects of an event if one of your [Stark] characters is chosen as the only target.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: pay X gold to choose and discard from play X Ally or Mercenary characters. X must be greater than 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: save a unique location with cost 3 or higher from being discarded. Then attach Fortify to that location as a duplicate.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after a character you own is killed, kneel to remove it from the dead pile and attach it to the Eyrie. Marshalling: place an attached character back into play (limit 1 per round).

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: lower the cost of the next [Baratheon] character you play this phase by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only. Marshalling: pay 2 gold to choose and kneel a character. Discard all power and non-duplicate attachments from that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: pay 2 gold to have each player choose and kill one of his or her characters. Limit 1 per round.

property.value: Marshalling: pay 2 gold to shuffle all [Stark] characters in your dead pile back into your deck.

property.value: Response: after you win a [Military] challenge, choose and kill a character controlled by the losing opponent.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you win a [Military] challenge, choose and discard from play up to 2 locations controlled by the losing opponent. Limit 1 per challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: play after you win a challenge as the attacker by 4 or more total STR. You may initiate an additional challenge of that type this phase. Limit 1 per phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: save a [Greyjoy] character from being killed. Then attach this card to the saved character (counts as a Condition attachment) with the text 'Attached character gets +1 STR.'

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only. Any phase: choose a Trait. Until the end of the phase, all of your [Lannister] characters gain that Trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark only. Marshalling: pay 3 gold to search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you win or lose a challenge by 4 or more total STR, put a [Targaryen] character with printed cost 2 or lower into play from your hand. Limit 1 per challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: play during a [Military] challenge. Kneel one of your characters with STR 3 or higher to lower the printed Claim value on the attacking player's plot card to 0 for the duration of the challenge. No responses to this challenge may be used.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you win an [Intrigue] challenge, choose and kill a character without an [Intrigue] icon controlled by the losing player. Limit 1 per challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: choose and return a unique [Targaryen] character from your dead pile to your hand. Limit 1 per round.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Targaryen only. Marshalling: pay 3 gold to give each character -1 STR until the end of the phase (if a character's STR is 0, it is killed). Limit 1 per round.

card.name: The Horn that Wakes the Sleepers

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: choose and stand up to 2 Night's Watch characters. Play only if there is a Creature character in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark only. Marshalling: pay 6 gold to choose up to 2 non-Army characters in your discard pile. Put those characters into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: choose a participating [Greyjoy] character. That character gets +2 STR for the duration of the challenge (+4 STR instead if you control at least 2 Warship locations).

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: choose a participating [Lannister] character. That character gets +2 STR for the duration of the challenge (+4 STR instead if the opposing player has fewer cards in hand than you).

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only. Marshalling: pay 6 gold to kneel all non-[Lannister] characters with STR 3 or lower.

property.name: Text
property.value: Draw: At the end of the draw phase, draw three additional cards. You may not play any characters from your hand this marshalling phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: choose a participating [Baratheon] character. That character gets +2 STR for the duration of the challenge (+4 STR instead if that character is participating alone).

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: each [Baratheon] character gains a [Power] icon until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only. Any phase: Look at an opponent's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon only. Marshalling: pay 3 gold to return a card from your discard or dead pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: choose a participating [Stark] character. That character gets +2 STR for the duration of the challenge (+4 STR instead if that character is defending).

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: kneel one of your [Lannister] characters to cancel the effects of an event card just played, or ability which a character just knelt to use.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only. Marshalling: pay 3 gold to draw 3 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon only. Marshalling: pay 4 gold to have each player shuffle his or her discard pile into his or her deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon only. Marshalling: pay 6 gold to put into play all characters from all dead piles.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may play cards from other Houses without paying a gold penalty.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may not play cards from your hand. At the beginning of the standing phase, you are eliminated from the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, search your deck for a location card you do not have in play, reveal that card to all playres, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed kneel all non-King's Landing locations.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, each player choses up to 2 of his or her locations. All other locations are discarded from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may initiate an additional [Power] challenge this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon only. When revealed, return a [Baratheon] character from your dead pile to your hand, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, choose a character. Kneel that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only House Baratheon may reveal this plot.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may initiate an additional [Intrigue] challenge this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Non-unique characters cannot be declared as defenders.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, name a non-plot card. That card may not be played this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only House Greyjoy may reveal this plot.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Targaryen only. When revealed, choose and discard an attachment from play, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, each player chooses and discards one of his or her characters from play (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only. Each of your income providing locations and characters provides an additional +1 income.

property.name: Text
property.value: No player may initiate [Intrigue] challenges.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limit 1 per plot deck. When revealed, kill all characters in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark only. Characters get -1 STR while attacking you.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Greyjoy only. The cost for your opponents to play characters is increased by 1. This is considered to be a gold penalty.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may not declare defenders this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only house Lannister may reveal this plot. Your Claim value is +2 during [Intrigue] challenges you initiate.

property.name: Text
property.value: No player may initiate [Power] challenges.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may initiate an additional [Military] challenge this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, search your deck for a character you do not have in play, reveal it to all players and then put it into yoru hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Skip the standing phase this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each character in play this round gets -1 STR. If a character's STR becomes 0 or lower this round, that character is discarded from play (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value: No player may initiate [Military] challenges.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only house Stark may reveal this plot.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, each player chooses up to 3 of his or her characters. All characters not chosen are killed (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value: Round Sequence 1. Plot 2. Draw 3. Marshalling 4. Challenges 5. Dominance 6. Stand

property.name: Text
property.value: Round Sequence 1. Plot 2. Draw 3. Marshalling 4. Challenges 5. Dominance 6. Stand

property.value: Round Sequence 1. Plot 2. Draw 3. Marshalling 4. Challenges 5. Dominance 6. Stand
